title: Deep Terror Thresh back animation bugged
body:
On Deep Terror Thresh, when you press B to go back to base, you usually get the gold chest animation. However you can get a sad black tire animation, when this occurs, me, as the owner of the skin, in game, can't see the tire animation but the gold chest animation, while my teammates can see the black tire animation.
I can press B as many times as I want to check it and I can't manage to see the tire animation, but my friends do see it.

replies.body:
Heya! 

I just loaded up with him and I was able to get the tire recall animation to play while playing as Deep Terror Thresh. The chance of getting it is quite less than the chest, as it's meant to be an easter egg. 

http://imgur.com/a/ZedGw
not everyone sees the same thing.
The issue is that you, as the owner of the skin, never see the tire animation, never.

That's sad, I have the skin too and really like it, call me crazy but I actually prefer it over my championship Thresh skin because it doesn't look so dull and has a fun recall animation.
Just my personal opinion though, don't hate me for it lol.
